ticket.title: Git safety hardening in lane workspaces: disable hooks, enforce safe.directory, refuse unsafe configs

tickets.reason: Lane workspaces are created from mirror.

in_scope: Ensure lane workspace git config is hardened:
- disable hooks (`core.hooksPath` to empty dir controlled by FAC)
- refuse repo configs that attempt to run external commands via filters/smudge if policy forbids
Record git hardening status in receipts.

steps: Implement post-checkout git config setup for lanes.
Add tests ensuring hooks do not run.

criteria: Malicious repo hooks do not execute during lane operations in default mode.
